game.name: Epic O'clock
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Senor epic is awoken from his epic slumber when he hears destiny calling to him. "hello" it says. and then it's gone. "i will go for a walk" says senor epic. uh oh mr stupid idiot guy put up danger. Move left, right, up, and even down through many levels so you can kill him!!! no z axis though!!!!!!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Senor epic is awoken from his epic slumber when he hears destiny calling to him. "hello" it says. and then it's gone. "i will go for a walk" says senor epic. uh oh mr stupid idiot guy put up danger. Move left, right, up, and even down through many levels so you can kill him!!! no z axis though!!!!!!
